english.segment1: VERSE1: When I think of all you are. In my life and in my heart. No words can say what I feel. Cause if everything is true. It's what I have found in you. Lord to me there is nothing so real. And though there is no way I can repay you. I'll give you whatever you want
english.segment2: CHORUS: I'll live a life that says you give me every song. With my every breath I'll make your mercy known. With every soul on earth or all alone. I will Love you, I will Love you
english.segment3: VERSE2: Angels see you face to face. If I could I'd take their place. And pour out my heart to you. But what they don't understand. Is to know your grace first hand. How it feels to love like I do. Yes you bring me to my knees with your kindness Theres nothing that I can hold back
english.segment4: CHORUS: I'll live a life that says you give me every song. With my every breath I'll make your mercy known. With every soul on earth or all alone. I will Love you, I will Love you
english.segment5: BRIDGE: With all I am and everything I have. I dedicate myself to doing one thing right
english.segment6: I will love you oooohhh. With my every breath I'll make your mercy known. with every soul on earth or all alone. I will Love you, I will Love you. Lord, I will love you. Lord, I will love you
